problems.title: Maximum Sum Of Two Non-Overlapping Subarrays (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
Given an integer array nums and two integers firstLen and secondLen, return the maximum sum of elements in two non-overlapping subarrays with lengths firstLen and secondLen.

Input Format:
First line: three integers n, firstLen, and secondLen.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print a single integer: the maximum sum.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
